titleStmt.title: SII 6.291: original edition by K. V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 291. (A.R. No. 8 of 1898). IN THE SAME PLACE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . matiraikoṇṭakoṇṭa kopparakesarivaṉmarkku yāṇṭu 10 5 Āvatu nāḷ 100 8 10 2 Uttarameruccaturvvetimaṅkalattu sabhaiyom Eḻuttu Emmūr yāṇṭu 10 4Āvatuvarai nel poṉ kiḻccikai kaṭava Eṉṟu Ivvāṭu koccaytu Elvu koṇṭa poṉṉiṭuvatu vikkamāy yippotu variyiṭāte Uṭkoḷāṭaṅka Uṭko
ṇṭu tiruppulivalattup perumāṉaṭikaḷukkum tulābhārattaḷip perumāṉaṭikaḷukkum kuṭikaḷ nantāviḷak kerippatākavum tiruvamirtu kāṭṭuvatākavum vaitta kuṭibhūmikaḷ viṟṟup poṉkoṇṭu Iṭṭu Ūrom viṟṟukkoṇṭa bhūmiyāl vanta tiruvamirtum tiruviḷakku vaittār vaittataṟkku Iraṭṭippaṭi vattu kuṭuttu muṭṭāmai Avvavvāṇṭu ceyum sa
Mvatsaravāriyapperumakkaḷey kuṭuppārāka śilālekai ceytukuṭukkaveṉṟu māhāsabhaittiruvaṭi paṇiyātalil nammūr pāṇiyattu vāmadevakramavittar paṅkukaḷvaḻi vaṭapiṭākait talaipāṭakaṅkaḷ marutattūriṉ melpakkattu tiruppulivalattup perumāṉaṭikaḷuk=ku Ivvāmadevakramavittar nantāviḷak kerippatāka vaytta Iraṇṭu pāṭakamāṉa nūṟu kuḻi
yāl Ivar vaitta nantāviḷakkukkum Iraṇṭu nantāviḷakku Ūrome Erippomākavum pāṇanti bhavaskantakramavittaccomāciyār taṅkaḷ paṅkukaḷvavaḻit teṉpiṭākai mullaivāyil Erivāy Ivar bhavaskantakramavittacomāciyār kiḻaittulābhārattaḷip perumāṉaṭikaḷukku Oru nantāviḷak kerippatāka vaitta bhūmi Oru pāṭaka
mum tāḻāciraAycakumārabhaṭṭarum mivar tampi brahmayaśatmaṉārum mivarkaḷ paṅkiṉvaḻi teṉpiṭākai puliyūriṉ vaṭapakkattut tulābhārattaḷi perumāṉaṭikaḷukku Oru tiruviḷak kerippatākavum Oru tiruvamirtuk=kumāka vaitta bhūmi Iraṇṭu pāṭakamumāy yittevarkku vaitta mūṉṟu pāṭakamum Ūrome viṟṟup poṉkoṇṭamaiyāl
Digital edition of SII 6.291 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
